title: PigeonMail
description: A scalable email automation platform that leverages Google's Gemini models to generate hyper-personalized content and curated news summaries. Built on Google Cloud for reliability and integrated with SendGrid for high-deliverability transactional emails.

features.title: Gemini-Powered Personalization
features.description: Utilizes the Gemini Pro model to analyze recipient data and craft unique, context-aware email bodies for every user.

features.title: AI News Curation
features.description: Automatically aggregates relevant news topics and uses Gemini to summarize them into digestible newsletters tailored to user interests.

features.title: Reliable Delivery Infrastructure
features.description: Ensures high email deliverability rates and real-time tracking by leveraging SendGrid's robust API.

features.title: Cloud-Native Architecture
features.description: Fully hosted on Google Cloud Platform ensuring scalability, security, and high uptime for critical email operations.
